newsitem.title: JAPAN: Yamaichi Securities to brief media on Ogawa Sec.
newsitem.headline: Yamaichi Securities to brief media on Ogawa Sec.

text.p: Yamaichi Securities Co Ltd said on Friday that it would hold a news conference at 11.30 a.m. (0230 GMT) on Ogawa Securities Co Ltd, one of its affiliates.
Ogawa said earlier on Friday that it would also hold a news conference at 11.30 a.m. (0230 GMT) about a temporary suspension of its operations.
Osaka-based Ogawa has been ordered by Japan's finance ministry to make management changes after it fell into a financial crisis.
Ogawa told Reuters on Friday that it had asked Yamaichi for financial support but it could not get a positive reply from Yamaichi.
